channel.title: Authors on Gregory Dobbels
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Gregory Dobbels

item.description:
I am a Ph.D. Candidate in Economics at Princeton University. My research aims to address questions at the intersection of urban, labor, and environmental economics using tools from empirical industrial organization and international trade.

This site is a bit of a placeholder for the moment, but if your interests overlap you should check out the research group I previously worked with: the Climate Impact Lab. They work at the forefront of economics and climate science to better understand the social costs of climate change.
